long_description: This Saris Bones 3-bike trunk rack has a unique arc-based design that separates bikes on different levels and fits over the spoilers of many cars. Rack comes preassembled with 6 attachment straps that secure the rack to your vehicle. Injection molded arms and legs are super strong and are built with 100% recycled, non-rusting materials. Integrated, ratcheting, anti-sway straps secure and stabilize bikes. Easily fits a wide range of vehicle styles: sedans, hatchbacks and mini-vans. Cradle design will accommodate most bicycle frame designs. Not intended for tandem or recumbent bikes; carrying bikes with step-through frames requires the purchase of an adapter (sold separately).
short_description: This Saris Bones 3-bike trunk rack has a unique arc-based design that separates bikes on different levels and fits over the spoilers of many cars.
